descriptionText: Create a new opponent to challenge your players in thrilling encounters. Customize their stats, abilities, and resistances to craft unique adversaries that will test your players' skills and strategies. Whether it's a cunning mastermind, a fearsome beast, or a horde of relentless minions, this tool empowers you to design memorable encounters that will keep your players on the edge of their seats.
title: Create Opponent
name: Name
detailsDescription: Detailed information about the opponent (supports Markdown)
